item.content:encoded:
Win.

A question to be asked – Win against who?

Useless to win against other people.

Useful to win over one’s own mind.

But real winning lies, in fighting face-to-face with God.

The creator.

The only thing we know about creator, is his creation.

The nature.

It can be exploited.

It can be hacked.

Truth can be seen.

Immortality can be achieved.

God can be uncovered.

Physics can be completed.

Win over nature.

That’s what is needed.

I’m tired of being a nihilist. It’s pathetic, to waste time.

So, here’s the objective purpose.

For all you nihilists.

Win.
